name: Motion Token
description: Motion is dynamic wellness business committed to redefining fitness through innovative online solutions. Our Motion Web3 enabled fitness app is designed to make getting fit fun and enjoyable, while helping you earn rewards every step of the way. Anonymous by design, you control what you share, when you share, and for how long you share it. With engaging community and personal challenges, you can create your fitness journey your way. Join us today and experience the power of Motion.
